text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with tres leches cake that is a
cake that's soaked with a sweet milk
syrup this is my mom Pauline's version
I'm back in New York so we filmed this
delicious dessert which usually she
would do a homemade cake for but time
and humidity dictated us using a box mix
so what she does here she took some
shortening on a piece of wax paper and
grease the baking pan we're going to
take one box of cake mix yellow cake mix
you can use white but we decided we like
the yellow vest three whole eggs a cup
of cold water quarter cup of vegetable
oil and a teaspoon of real vanilla and
then she's going to beat that with the
electric mixer until very smooth so a
couple tricks here you'll notice halfway
through she turns off the mixer takes
the spatula scrapes down the sides
otherwise you're going to get dry chunks
that kind of stick to the sides of the
you know the bowl there and they won't
incorporate so two or three times while
you're mixing this scrape down the sides
and she kept mixing that until you see
they're completely smooth now here's
another nice trick when you're done
beating don't just pull the beaters out
of the mix see how she raises them
slowly with it still on and the you know
the batter will fly off those beaters
and you don't have as much to scrape off
all right she scraped that into our
baking sheet now we are using a 15 by 10
inch baking pan here this recipe will
work beautifully in 13 by 9 which is
what most of you probably will have so
the only difference is this will come
out a little thinner the 13 by 9
obviously will be a little taller but
same recipe so feel free to use a 13 by
9 inch baking dish or baking pan alright
so smooth that out and then what you
want to do is you want to give it a
little shake and a couple taps on the
surface and it's going to bring any air
bubbles up to the top and make sure it's
completely even she put that in a 350
degree oven now because she used a wider
pan than usual this too only took about
20 to 23 minutes if you use a 13 by 9
pan you're probably looking at 25 to 30
minutes you know the test when a tooth
inserted in the middle comes out clean
it's done alright now you're gonna let
your cake cool for at least a half hour
she took a bamboo skewer and poked it
all over and that poking is going to
help that SERP get into the cake all
right now tres leches comes from the
fact that we're going to use three
different kinds of milks to soak this
cake with there's two of them evaporated
milk and condensed milk and we're also
going to use some half-and-half all
right we're going to mix our three milks
together we have a can of condensed milk
a can of evaporated milk and a cup of
half-and-half now she mixed that up now
she has this really interesting bowl set
when the bowl senses the liquid is up to
the top and it's too much liquid to be
mixed the bowl expands and gets slightly
larger you can see here how it can it
grew a little bit and then you're able
to mix it if you can find those those
are a really nice product and then the
rest is easy you're going to take your
milk CERP your tray slay chase so you're
learning in a recipe and two words in
Spanish so the three milks the three
milk syrup gets poured over ladle by
ladle all right dump it all on top and
you're going to think hey there's no way
this is going to soak in but you'll see
this was only a couple minutes time
lapse and you'll be amazed at how fast
that milks URP kind of soaks into that
cake so once it's soaked in to well
where you just can't see any obvious
giant puddles of milk go ahead and wrap
it throw it in the fridge for at least
three to four hours overnight is fine
most recipes tell you overnight to serve
for garnish we're actually going to do a
fourth kind of milk here if you want to
be technical I'm going to whip some
heavy whipping cream a little bit of
sugar a little bit of vanilla and that
tops our tres leches cake and if you
want to get really fancy you can spoon
over some strawberries so we have just a
little bit of diced strawberry and a
simple syrup and that gets put over the
top this is such a nice interesting
dessert really moist really delicious
very addictive everyone loves it and if
you use the box mix you can't really get
a simpler dessert than this and if you
have a good yellow cake white cake
recipe make it from scratch anyway
that's Pauline's tres leches cake I hope
you
that a try all the ingredients are on
